idea:
Commshala is a Start–up Private Limited Company incorporated on 25.04.2015 and engaged in the business of running and conducting training in the field of Banking & Finance and Accounting to the aspiring students who wanted to make/build their career in the Banking, Finance & Accounting sector. The company also provided assistance in placements of its students in the Banking, Finance and Accounting Sector. It has well developed curriculum and ultra-modern, state of art infrastructure and facilities for students and faculty consisting of highly qualified professional from banking, finance and accounting sector.

At Commshala, we transform the personality of our students and equip them with skills that are highly sought by recruiters across various industries like Retail banking, Non-banking Finance Companies, Financial institutions, Micro Small Medium Enterprise and Corporate’s. This makes our students highly employable in the job market. We accomplish this through state of the art training programs that are delivered to students by accomplished faculties in highly effective manner.

We are having highly qualified professionals who have worked with Banks and NBFCs. We are training students who bear testimony to our academic quality. Students from Commshala have been placed with leading Public Sector Banks, Private Sector Banks and NBFCs HDFC Bank, Muthoot Fincorp, L&T finance, IIFL, and many more.

Commshala with its vision of creating employability to students has received private equity investors namely M/S Grow India Captial Private Limited and invested with company’s plan and projections in their personal capacity. Commshala is the space where timeless values of credibility and recognition come together. These values are the foundation of our success. We strive to create credibility and recognition in everything that we do.
name: COMMSHALA EDU PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Jawrani MedTECH Consulting specializes in research, design and development of orthopaedic medical devices. The company provides these services to OEM's currently operating in this landscape, and are looking to expand their product portfolio to provide novel implant and instrument systems to their end users. The goal of our company is to provide services that will eventually enable patients to become people again so that they continue living a normal, healthy and active lifestyle.
name: JAWRANI MEDTECH CONSULTING LLP

idea:
Meir Commodities India Pvt Ltd is a freshly recognized agro commodity trading firm promoted and handled by Ex – ED&F Man and Ex – Trafigura employees.
We aim to register ourselves as a reliable source of quality agro commodity products for domestic and international markets with fair price discoveries and build dependable and profitable long term relationships with active buyers and suppliers across the globe.
Verticals –
1. Sugar
2. Molasses
3. Organics
4. Edible Oils
5. Coffee
6. Pulses
With our deep domestic and international ties we help both the suppiers and consumers to arrive at a market driven price discovery and provide value addition to their businesses.
name: MEIR Commodities INDIA Pvt Ltd
